description: The Leitz iPad cover with stand protects your iPad with a sleek, stylish design and the added functionality of a kickstand. The stand provides 2 angles for perfect viewing and tucks away with one click. The built-in privacy film cover opens and closes fully allowing you to protect sensitive information from other people on either side of you while still giving quick access to your iPad retina display. Touchscreen operation remains functional through scratch resistant privacy screen.
title: Leitz Privacy Cover Portrait with Stand for iPad 2/3/4 (6342-02)
